    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        boolean addUser(java.lang.String user,
              java.lang.String pwd)
        Add a new user to database
        Parameters:
        user - a username id
        pwd - a secret key (which will be stored their digest)
        Returns:
        true if the operation is executed, otherwise returns false (if username already exist)

        Returns:

        Returns:
